GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: posts a topic and returns posted topic to client

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles.description: posts an article and returns posted article to client

article.title: 5 things you can do with paper
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article based on given id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments based on given article id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment based on given article id and returns added comment to client

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article based on given article id and returns updated article to client

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: deletes an article and its corresponding comments based on given article ID

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object based on provided username

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment based on given comment ID

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates a comment based on given comment ID
